content: Why are dogs better than cats?

chosen: Dogs are better pets than cats because they are more loving and protective of their owners. Dogs also have a stronger sense of loyalty, and will do anything to please their masters. Cats, on the other hand, are independent creatures that can be difficult to train and may not always show the same level of affection as a dog.
rejected: Dogs are better pets than cats because they are more loving and loyal. They also make great companions, and can be trained to do many tasks. Cats, on the other hand, are independent creatures that don't require as much attention or exercise.
